summary: A new and cosy manor near Falkreath. Develop the secrets of this hunters home and it's benefits.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/titledgnwao95bt.jpg[/img]

[b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b]
-) Skyrim with the latest patch

[b]Videos:[/b]
[youtube]xviHHIIE41o[/youtube] [youtube]N0DN5pnrAwI[/youtube]

Big thanks for that awsome videso to [b][color=lightgreen]hodilton[/color][/b] and [b][color=lightgreen]Brodual[/color][/b], please visit their sites and vote for their videos.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/user/hodilton?feature=watch]hodliton's videos[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/user/BDMods?feature=watch]BDMods[/url]


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/description78vyieh9mj.jpg[/img]

I am glad to introduce my newest creation. The [color=#339900][i]Wildhunt Manor[/i][/color], which is themed around the hunt and the wilds. You will find a cozy and
warm home with lots of pelts and furs. Also a lot of trophies and dead animals or even living are in this nice and well situated hunters abode.
The interior lightning is more orange and warm themed to perfectly fit the humble feeling the house should give you.
Also outside you will find a lot of nature and nice ambient.
Inside there is also a secret. A hidden Cellar with another hidden entrance to a natural and beautiful bathing cave. Can you find it?
It took me long times to create this home and also the design it delivers.
I hope you enjoy using it as much as I enjoyed the creation of the home.

Now to the features ofc.


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/featuresx58lsnqgu7.jpg[/img]

[b]Full Navmeshd !![/b]

[color=#889922][i]Outside:[/i][/color]
- beautiful ambient
- overgrown house
- woodchopping block
- a shrine of Kynareth
- beautiful view and also a nearby Tower of the vanilla game

[color=#889922][i]Inside:[/i][/color]
- cosy and nice lightning (a lot of warm orange)
- a lot of pelts, furs, trophies and animal parts
- tanning rack
- 3 Mannequins
- Weapon plaques
- A bed with a statue of a stuffed Troll
- some paintings
- storage area
- a cold box to store your fresh meat !!
- a friendly skeever named [color=#339900]Skrittlers[/color]
- secret entrance to the hidden cellar
- dinning table
- cooking pot and fire place

[color=#889922][i]Hidden cellar:[/i][/color]
- unique structure built out of vanilla models
- nice lightning and ambient
- workbench, sharpening wheel, smithing facilities
- a enchanting area
- 1 Mannequin
- 1 Weapon rack and 1 Weapon plaque
- Storage for animal parts or sth. else
- a hidden secret cave
- cave has a nice hot water to take your bath
- unique look

[center][size=+1][i]Generally I suggest you to download the house and try it out yourself, because pictures or words can't describe the reality appropriate.[/i][/size][/center]


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/installationcv8kjo7b52.jpg[/img]

I would propose you to use the NMM manager to install this modification, because it's the easiest way.

[b][u]NMM:[/u][/b]
Klick on the download with NMM manager button and install the mod

[b][u]Manual:[/u][/b]
If you want to install this mod manually, you have to download it and unpack the archive somewhere. After you unpacked it drop the Wildhunt_Manor.esp and .bsa into your Skyrim/Data folder. Later on chose your prefered launcher and activate the .esp


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/uninstallationw4vn2sy591.jpg[/img]

Again I suggest using the NMM, which provides a much easier way to handle mods.

[b][u]NMM:[/u][/b]
Deactivate the mod in the NMM mod list and delete it afterwards

[b][u]Manual:[/u][/b]
Remove the Wildhunt_Manor.esp and .bsa from your Skyrim/Data folder


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/changeskbardxt9yw.jpg[/img]

Version 1.0 -- Initial release
[color=green]---------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Version 1.1 -- Fixes
[b]Fixed:[/b]
- Strange wall should work now
- Floating alchemy table in hidden cave removed
- Placed the note more fixed I hope ^^
- minor changes and cosmetic stuff
[color=green]---------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Version 1.2 -- Fixes
[b]Fixed:[/b]
- Skeever is now killable
- Dinning table bug fixed, where you could fall through


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/faqz7t6kevsu2.jpg[/img]

[color=#AA9900][i]Q: Where do I find that home ?[/i][/color]
A: Just look at the included "Location" screenshot in the downloaded folder. Or you can also view the Location here in the images tab

[color=#AA9900][i]Q: Is that mod cleaned with TES5Edit ?[/i][/color]
A: Yes ofc. it was cleaned and checked with TES5Edit.

[color=#AA9900][i]Q: Why is there no quest for that home ?[/i][/color]
A: I have to admit that I am sadly not good enough atm or don't have the time to deal with making quests. Tho I hope you enjoy the mod ^^.

[color=#AA9900][i]Q: Are all containers safe ?[/i][/color]
A: Yes they are safe.

[color=#AA9900][i]Q: Can you do XXX and that for me ?[/i][/color]
A: Maybe just post what you would like to change or include and I'll see what I can do.

[color=#AA9900][i]Q: Why it's near that tower ?[/i][/color]
A: I haven't seen it at working in the creation kit. But I guess it won't harm you to live near bandits ^^.


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/creditsh9ot7g5evn.jpg[/img]

Blary for his fantastic resources I used
Oaristys & Tony67 for their fantastic Modders Resource pack
PAINTINGS and FRAMES created by Artisanix
Bethesda for creation of the game and the CK

[center][img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/specialuynh0rikm3.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=+2][center][b]And finally don't forget to enjoy the mod and the game !![/b][/center][/size]



[b][color=green]OtherMods[/color][/b]

Please if you like the mod you should also visit or check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3507075/?]Nahkin's Mods[/url]

Also I suggest you to visit the following awsome house modders or their projects:

author: Nahkin
